item.title: Trudeau Brought Woe to Canada
item.description: Nine years of Trudeau have clearly made Canada poorer, weaker, less free, and increasingly dysfunctional.

item.title: The Democrats’ Campaign against the Supreme Court Pauses with a Whimper
item.description: The attacks on the Court are unlikely to end, but everything that’s been tried so far has failed, and the Left knows it.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg Goes Musk
item.description: His announcement that Facebook and Instagram will move away from censorship is a win for open speech.

item.title: Politics and rose gardens, &c.
item.description: On Trump and Trumpism; human guardrails; a South American dictator; a musical ‘point of light’; and more.

item.title: The Better-Than List for 2024
item.description: Correcting the movie year’s offenses with unexpectedly good cinema.
